thread.title: Vin Diesel Says He'll Be in a Dungeons & Dragons Movie Only if It's "Very Sacred"
thread.title_full: Vin Diesel Says He'll Be in a Dungeons & Dragons Movie Only if It's "Very Sacred"

title: Vin Diesel Says He'll Be in a Dungeons & Dragons Movie Only if It's "Very Sacred"
text:
Vin Diesel Says He'll Be in a Dungeons & Dragons Movie Only if It's "Very Sacred" 
Published By: EscapistMagazine.com - Today 
During a press junket, noted Dungeons & Dragons fan Vin Diesel said he wouldn't appear in any film adaptation that was less than amazing.
